alert.note: Alert for Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 4:46PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Millard County through 515 PM MDT... At 446 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of Meadow, or 17 miles west of Fillmore, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fillmore and Flowell. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 166 and 167. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Juab, Millard Counties; Western Millard and Juab Counties
